summary: Comprehensive Django test suite that validates timezone handling across the application, including admin interfaces, database interactions, form processing, model behavior, serialization formats, and template tags, under both legacy and modern configurations and with varying database timezone support.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable and consistent datetime management throughout the system, ensuring correct storage, retrieval, display, and conversion of dates and times across different time zones, handling ambiguous or invalid inputs, and providing proper fallbacks when the database lacks timezone capabilities.
